They both reacted positively to Barack Obama 's speech. Kirsten Gillibrand said Barack Obama laid out a bold vision for this Congress. She called last year's election, in which Republicans gained control of the House and picked up seats in the Senate`` a mandate for action,'' rather than`` for any one political party.''

During a recent interview, Simon Cowell has revealed that he will be making an announcement in regard to the show in two weeks. As Digital Spy reports, Simon Cowell said of the new show: We are in the process of going through all the shows. I think there are going to be a few surprises. I genuinely do. I don't think there's one set way of doing it.... I am in conversations with ITV and Fox. Simon Cowell went on to reveal:`` We are going to make an announcement soon.
